hero.subtitle: Full Stack AI Engineer
hero.description: Networks and Information Systems Engineering graduate passionate about AI and innovative web development solutions. Ready to tackle ambitious projects with rigor and curiosity.

sections.resumeDescription: Get a detailed overview of my experience, skills, and qualifications.

interactiveConference.title: Interactive Conference Platform
interactiveConference.description: Developed a comprehensive platform for preparing and broadcasting enriched interactive live conferences with real-time audience interaction, media integration, and presentation scenario management.

cryptoNow.title: CryptoNow - AI Analytics
cryptoNow.description: Built a Python-based cryptocurrency analysis tool featuring web scraping, sentiment analysis, prediction algorithms, and GPT-powered result explanations for comprehensive market insights.

familyCalendar.title: Family Calendar Web Application
familyCalendar.description: Created a full-stack Laravel application for family calendar management with admin dashboard, event consultation, and comprehensive family management features.

libraryManagement.title: AI-Powered Library Management
libraryManagement.description: Developed a comprehensive library management system for educational institutions with integrated AI chatbot connected to internal data for enhanced user experience.

trafficViolation.title: Traffic Violation Management System
trafficViolation.description: Built a PHP-based CRM system optimizing client, property, and appointment management with automated correspondence and scheduling processes.

employeeAnalytics.title: Employee Data Analytics Platform
employeeAnalytics.description: Implemented a comprehensive data analysis solution for enterprise employee management with advanced analytics and insights generation capabilities.

medicaLigne.title: Full Stack AI Developer
medicaLigne.description: Working on AI-driven solutions and full-stack development projects.

tamtam2025.title: Full Stack AI Engineer
tamtam2025.description: Implementation of a management platform for the preparation and enhanced delivery of live interactive conferences. Creation and management of presentation scenarios (scripts, presentation flow, prompter). Media integration (videos, images, documents). Real-time interaction with the audience (polls, Q&A, chat). Differentiated between users. Final year project in Web Development and AI.

tamtam2024.title: Full Stack Developer Intern
tamtam2024.description: Developed an interactive conference platform with real-time audience interaction, media integration, and presentation scenario management. Implemented SCRUM methodology for efficient project delivery.

oneClick.title: Web Development Intern
oneClick.description: Creation of a family calendar website with Laravel fullstack: Multi-user management system with family task assignment and real-time calendar synchronization. Admin dashboard: event monitoring, user request processing, and centralized back-office management. End of year project in Web Development.

aliDanTek.title: Web Development Intern
aliDanTek.description: Intelligent Medical Call Center: AI-Driven Patient Triage & Appointment Management System. AI Call Center Application: Development of a solution with RAG and prompt engineering for doctor/patient interfaces and automated appointment management. LLM Integration & AI Tools: Implementation of intelligent interactions between language models and medical systems for clinical support and patient triage.

greencom.title: Web Development Intern
greencom.description: CRM aimed at optimizing client, property, and appointment management, with automation of correspondence and scheduling processes. Creation of the user interface (UI) for the back office. Full-stack development of appointment, request, and user profile management modules, in collaboration with the team.
